title: A motion tending to the publick good of this age and of posteritie, or, The coppies of certain letters written by Mr. John Dury to a worthy Knight at his earnest desire shewing briefly vvhat a publik good is and how by the best means of reformation in learning and religion it may be advanced to some perfection / published by Samuel Hartlib ...
author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by P.L. for Michael Sparke, Senior ...,
